blogPost.excerpt: Glyphs 3 is a Mac font editor that puts you in control: quickly draw high-precision vectors, efficiently reuse shapes, and easily manage any number of letters, figures and symbols.
blogPost.body: Glyphs 3 is a Mac font editor that puts you in control: quickly draw high-precision vectors, efficiently reuse shapes, and easily manage any number of letters, figures and symbols.
blogPost.title: Glyphs 3.0 - Build, edit and manage fonts on your Mac
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字体编辑器，让你掌控一切：快速绘制高精度矢量，高效重用形状，轻松管理任意数量的字母、数字和符号。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、编辑和管理字体。

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字體編輯器，讓你掌控一切：快速繪製高精度矢量，高效重用形狀，輕鬆管理任意數量的字母、數字和符號。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、編輯和管理字體。

previous.excerpt: Block Party builds tools against online abuse. Our mission is to create a safer online experience by building solutions for user control, protection and safety. Use Block Party to filter out unwanted @mentions from Twitter and take control of your online experience.
previous.title: Block Party - Bye-bye, Twitter trolls 👋

localize.description: Block Party打造的工具可以防止网络滥用。我们的使命是通过构建用户控制、保护和安全的解决方案来创造更安全的在线体验。使用Block Party过滤掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，并控制您的在线体验。
Block Party打造的工具可以防止網絡濫用。我們的使命是通過構建用戶控制、保護和安全的解決方案來創造更安全的在線體驗。使用Block Party過濾掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，並控制您的在線體驗。

next.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
next.title: Smooth Hand Mockups - Create animated hand mockups and gestures for all devices

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以帮助您通过动画手部模拟来正确展示您的应用程序和服务。它的设计是为了让你的视频自明和吸引人。
localize.tagline: 为所有设备创建动画手势模拟和手势。

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以幫助您通過動畫手部模擬來正確展示您的應用程序和服務。它的設計是爲了讓你的視頻自明和吸引人。
localize.tagline: 爲所有設備創建動畫手勢模擬和手勢。
